page.title: 15Children's Games in Alton(1)
page.content: When I was five we used to play Kiss Chase.The boys had to chase the girls and kiss us if they caught us. When I was little I used to play Cops and Robbers,a chasing game.We also played Army,usually with British and Germans and sometimes Japanese. When I was eight I used to play hairdressers with my friend Jane.We would take it in turns being the hairdresser and customer and style and plait each other's hair. When I was ten I played Jump the River.If you missed the other bank you would get wet. We used to play Grass It in a field of long grass.One person counts with his eyes closed,while the others crawl in the grass.Then he has to track them.
